title: Hugging Face For Developers
description: Exploring Hugging Face from a developer perspective - from rapid prototyping (using Hugging Face Hub) to deployment on Azure (using Hugging Face Models from Azure AI Model Catalog) - using a code-first approach with Python, Visual Studio Code, and GitHub tooling.
